Node.definition: = action by which humans supervise, direct or oversee work (such as building or repairing) or worship (such as singing or playing instruments)
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which humans express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to deities about who they are and what they do
= action by which someone purposely refrains from responding, either with words or with actions
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= process by which (someone's) mouth opens up ► in order to speak

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking
literally: falsehood; hence: = state in which things that are being communicated are factually untrue
hatred (between siblings)
literally: to go around; hence: = action by which groups of humans or animals take position all around an individual, a group, or an object
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans
= action by which someone performs an event without any argument, cause, or reason that could possibly explain or justify it
= affection between people, or between people and deities
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness

Node.gloss: to place (responsibility on someone) > to lay upon|to bring upon|to impose upon|to charge with|to commit to
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities hold (other) humans responsible for an event that has taken place or that is to take place in the future
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong, resulting in a state of guilt and, eventually, hardship and suffering
hatred (between siblings)
= affection between people, or between people and deities
= causative action by which humans or deities give someone else a certain responsibility or position of authority with regards to an object, a group of people, or an entire land or nation
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness
= state in which a human being is responsible for a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether committed on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= relatively low frequency of events or short duration of an event
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= person whose father has passed away and therefore unable to care for himself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the widows, and other people who are poor
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= woman whose husband has died and therefore has difficulty caring for herself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the fatherless, and other people who are poor
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
meaning unsure; possibly: = action by which humans request other humans for a hand out
= state in which a land, building, or town has been totally destroyed, ► to the extent that nobody can live there anymore
= action with which a person gives money or something of value to another person with the expectation that it will be paid back or returned
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which someone takes all sorts of goods (including people and animals) by force from an enemy in war
= a person considered as not belonging to a certain group, be it religious, ethnic, or social
= the results of laborious work which requires a lot of energy and ultimately results in exhaustion
= causative action by which deities cause a certain situation to last longer

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

Node.gloss: to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to be gracious|to pity
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly

= person whose father has passed away and therefore unable to care for himself; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker members of the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the aliens, the widows, and other people who are poor
literally: (one's) end; hence: = people born as one's offspring
literally: to cut off (people); hence: = causative action by which humans and deities cause (other) humans to die a violent death
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range
= causative action by which deities or humans ensure that (other) humans and/or their actions will no longer be remembered
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= causative action by which humans or deities cause information that is stored in someone else's mind to be reprocessed by speaking about it
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
= indirect male progenitor
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= causative action by which deities decide to no longer hold a certain human's behavior against that person, as if by erasing that sin from one's record
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: to cut off (an event); hence: = causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to stop happening

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= process in which information that is stored in one's mind regarding someone or something is being reprocessed continually and/or repeatedly
= a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes
= a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God
= state in which humans lack confidence
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

= actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event
= action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
literally: to clothe oneself; hence: = action by which humans are deities engage themselves in a certain activity

= actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it
= a generic word for clothing, which in certain contexts may denote a specific kind of clothes, such as someone's tunic or armor

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
literally: bones; hence: = the physical body of a human being
= generic designation for any article of clothing
= state in which humans wear a piece of clothing wrapped around their body
= strip ◄ of leather ► worn around the waist and part of one's daily attire; ≈ associated with one's daily activities

Node.gloss: to gird oneself|to put on (clothes, armor)
Node.definition: = action by which someone ties a belt or piece of cloth around the waist; hence also: to put on clothes or armor
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= process by which humans are emotionally wounded
literally: to stretch itself; hence: = process in which an object becomes larger
= process by which an object vanishes from existence

= six legged, winged insect that is characterized by the fact that its third pair of legs is elongated and adapted to hopping; insects of this type move in swarms at certain periods and migrate to new areas, which they colonize; at other times they live either solitary or in small groups; ◄ Acrididae family; ► normally eaten cooked by toasting, grilling, frying, or broiling, though in some places they are also eaten raw; clean animal, that may be eaten
= central area of the leg where the thigh is joined to the lower leg; ≈ associated with stability and strength
literally: to stumble; hence: hence: process by which humans go through a time in which they are unable to cope with the circumstances they have to deal with

= action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him
= the physical body of humans and animals, not including the mind and the inner person
= process by which humans lose body volume ◄ as a result of sickness or fasting
= oily substance found in the body of humans and animal
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= an individual, nation, or land that is affected by efforts from others to arouse an emotion of shame in them ◄ by words or actions

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= actions by which humans or deities consign other humans or deities or inanimate objects to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, fear, anger, or hostility, or because one was paid to do so; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy

Node.gloss: to be clothed (with a certain state)
Node.definition: literally: to be clothed; hence: = process by which humans or deities attain a certain quality or status
= state in which humans experience a feeling of shame, as a result of their own actions or because of what other have done
= state in which humans wear a piece of clothing wrapped around their body

= long garment, hanging down to the ankles, ◄ usually made of wool, ► and worn over the tunic (כֻּתֹּנֶת) it is not clear whether it had sleeves or not, nor whether it was open or closed in the front; ≈ certain attitudes and emotions are often described in terms of such a garment, e.g. he wore fury like a robe
= state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= action by which humans or divine beings express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to (other) humans or deities about who they are and what they do
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= person who does not have the means to provide for himself/herself, economically or otherwise, and therefore depends on help from other people and God
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
